prompts.content:
agent chapter-composer lakukan pemrosesan pada dokumen-dokumen di folder berikut  ./BUKU-2/01-FRONT-OFFICE-(UPDL-SEMARANG)/markdown-improved untuk bab-1 
Lakukan assignment sub bab sebagaimana urutan alphabetical order file.

It turns out, all files at ./BUKU-2/01-FRONT-OFFICE-(UPDL-SEMARANG)/markdown-improved become Chapter 2 instead of 1
You can use chapter-modify-numbering skill
No, what I mean is: the correct chapter number for those files are Chapter 2. Currently it's chapter 1.
Next, all .md files on this folder BUKU-2/02-HOUSEKEEPING-(UPDL-PANDAAN)/markdown-composed is to be set to chapter 3. Currently, it's chapter 2.
Next, all .md files on this folder ./BUKU-2/13-PROSEDUR-LAYANAN-PENUNJANG-(UPDL-MAKASAR)/0B-improved-sop is to be set to chapter 10. Currently, it's chapter 13.
Next, all .md files on this folder BUKU-2/06-PROSES-PEMBELAJARAN-ONLINE-DAN-TATA-TERTIB-(-UPDL-BOGOR)/versi-improved is to be set to chapter 7. Currently, it's chapter 6.
Next, all .md files on this folder ./BUKU-2/08A-PELAYANAN-ASESMEN-UPAC/0B-improved-sop is to be set to chapter 8. Currently, it's chapter 7.
This also ./BUKU-2/08B-PELAYANAN-SERTIFIKASI-UPS to be set to chapter 8. Currently it's 7
Next, all .md files on this folder ./BUKU-2/09-PENGELOLAAN-PERPUSTAKAAN-(UPDL-PALEMBANG)/0B-improved-sop is to be set to chapter 9. Currently, it's chapter 8.
